Parameters: Context that the share will be launched from
PlusShare.Builder(android.content.Contex.Description: Create a new Builder for launching a sharing action from the given context.

PlusShare.Builder(java.lang.String).Description: Create a new Builder for launching a sharing action.

setType(java.lang.String).Description: Set the type of data being shared.

Parameters: the URL to link to on the web.
setContentUrl(android.net.Uri).Description: Sets a URL to link to from the content on the web. The content URL is required when used in conjunction with @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#PlusShare#Builder#addCallToAction_E@ to build an interactive post, and to provide the user context for the call-to-action button.

Parameters: The user to send the post as, see @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#People#getCurrentPerson_E@.
A list of recipients. See @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#People#load_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#PlusShare#createPerson_E@.
setRecipients(com.google.android.gms.plu.Description: Sets a list of people to send the interactive post to. This sets the initial people to share with, but the user can change who the post is shared with before posting. A maximum of ten recipients are allowed.
setRecipients(com.google.android.gms.plu.FullName: public PlusShare.Builder setRecipients (Person user, List<Person> recipientList)

Parameters: Activity that the share will be launched from
PlusShare.Builder(android.app.Activity).Description: Create a new Builder for launching a sharing action from launchingActivity.

Parameters: URI of the stream to share.
addStream(android.net.Uri).Description: Add a stream URI to the data that should be shared. If this is not the first stream URI added the final intent constructed will become an ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE intent. Not all apps will handle both ACTION_SEND and ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE.

Parameters: The deep-link ID to a resource to share on Google+. This parameter is required.
setContentDeepLinkId(java.lang.String).Description: Include a deep-link URI of a resource to share on Google+.

Parameters: URI of the stream to share
setStream(android.net.Uri).Description: Set a stream URI to the data that should be shared. This replaces all currently set stream URIs and will produce a single-stream ACTION_SEND intent.

setText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set a pre-filled message to be sent as part of the share. This may be a styled CharSequence.

Parameters: The deep-link ID to a resource to share on Google+. This parameter is required.
The title of the resource. Used if there is no content URL to display. This parameter is optional.
The description of a resource. Used if there is no content URL to display. This parameter is optional.
The thumbnailUri for a resource. Used if there is no content URL to display. This parameter is optional.
setContentDeepLinkId(java.lang.String, j.Description: Include a deep-link ID to a resource to share on Google+.
setContentDeepLinkId(java.lang.String, j.FullName: public PlusShare.Builder setContentDeepLinkId (String deepLinkId, String title, String description, Uri thumbnailUri)

Parameters: The call-to-action label. Choose a value from the list of s_E@
The URL to link to when the user clicks the call-to-action. This parameter is required.
A deep-link ID to send to mobile clients when the user clicks the call-to-action. This parameter is optional.
addCallToAction(java.lang.String, androi.Description: Adds a call-to-action button for an interactive post. To use this method, you must have passed a signed-in PlusClient to the Builder.Builder(Activity, PlusClient) constructor or an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@ will be thrown.
addCallToAction(java.lang.String, androi.FullName: public PlusShare.Builder addCallToAction (String label, Uri uri, String deepLinkId)

getIntent().Description: Retrieve the Intent as configured so far by the Builder.
